description:
This Cosy Studio is located in a beautiful and peaceful area in the center of Manhattan. Many bars and restaurants are within walking distance. 
Equipped with brand new furniture, appliances and  all the necessities. It features a queen bed with Beautyrest mattress, Sharp 50" Smart Roku TV,  wireless internet,  bath tub, and a fully equipped kitchen ( toaster, microwave, blender, electric kettle). The building has an elevator and a laundry room.

It is close to many popular areas of the city such as Union Square, East Village, Chelsea, Time Square, Flatiron.
name: Cosy cute and new studio
review: Great location and the host was very welcoming. The finishes and decor are new. The apartment was very clean and well-stocked. The bed is comfortable. I also enjoyed the big smart TV. Overall pleasant experience. I would definitely stay there again.
